channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: Aspiring researcher, fascinated by learning algorithms. I blog about Neural Networks and Deep Leanring.

item.title: Neural Style Transfer
item.description: This post explores and reproduces the paper titled “A Neural Algorithm of Artistic Style” by Leon A. Gatys, Alexander S. Ecker and Matthias Bethge. This post is also avaiable as a Jupyter Notebook. I recommened reading the annotated paper in tandem with this post.

item.title: Welcome to this blog
item.description: Hey! Welcome to my blog, it’s great to have you :)
